articles.title: Tesla shares slump after European sales fall - BBC.com
articles.description: Shares in the US electric carmaker dropped after European sales halved in January.
articles.content:
Shares in electric car maker Tesla have slumped more than 9% after EU and UK sales fell by almost half in January.
The drop in Tesla shares took the company's valuation back below $1trn for the firs… [+2166 chars]

articles.author: Marcia Dunn
articles.title: Asteroid 2024 YR4 is no longer a threat to Earth, scientists say - The Associated Press
articles.description: Scientists have finally given the all-clear to Earth from a newly discovered asteroid. NASA and the European Space Agency said Tuesday that after two months of observations, scientists have almost fully ruled out any threat. At one point, the odds of a strike…
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) Scientists have finally given the all-clear to Earth from a newly discovered asteroid.
